name: Pink Guy wants to go home
name_original: Pink Guy wants to go home
description:
Help Pink Guy go back home for the forest is dark and full of monsters. He carries with him an infinite amount of rocks, use them to attack monsters. You can also hit monsters but Pink Guy can't reach far, only use in times of trouble!

Controls:

UP: climb

LEFT/RIGHT: move

SPACE: jump

RIGHT CLICK: hit 

HOLD Q: to throw rocks

MOUSE: to aim

R: move to different room

--------------------------------------------
